policies.involuntary_refund:
- Eligible if HX cancels flight, causes missed connection
- 100% refund if unused; otherwise, refund based on unused portion.
- Must be requested within 60 days of disrupted flight.
- Contact our team at usa@apg-ga.us with full PNR History and ticket display; waiver code is required.
policies.involuntary_reissue:
- Rebooking due to flight irregularities must be processed within 10 days of the affected flight.
- New flight must depart within 2 days before or 7 days after original date.
- Change must be to first available HX-operated flight.
- One-time waiver applies only; further changes subject to fare rules.
policies.voluntary_refund:
Voluntary Refunds:
- Must follow fare rules associated with tickets
policies.medical_refund: - Provide medical certificate along with invoice for expenses. Refund authorization is subject to Hong Kong Airlines verification and approval.
policies.name_change:
Individual Bookings (FIT):
- One-time free change allowed for:
  → Title/gender correction
  → Middle name correction
  → Inverted name order
  → ≤3-character spelling fix
  → Legal changes (marriage, divorce, etc.) with documentation

Send your request to usa@apg-ga.us along with a copy of passport.

- All other changes: HKD 400 or equivalent applies
policies.group_booking:
- Group tickets must be handled via local support channels.
- Name changes and reissues follow group fee matrix:
  → HKD 500 (standard)
  → HKD 800 (peak season)
- Tour leader name changes waived for medical emergencies (proof required)
- Group rebooking support handled offline
- No B2C support offered by APG USA—must contact local station
policies.infant_policy:
- Infants under 7 days old are not permitted.
- One infant per adult allowed.
- Infant ticket fare and baggage allowance vary by region.
policies.seat_request_policy: - Seats cannot be pre-assigned on code-share flights. In this case, seats will be assigned at the airport the same day of travel.
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy: Void the same day of issuance.

support_contacts._note: For internal use only. Do not include in autoresponse emails.
